participant_1.background:
I love to lift weights and enjoy simpler things in life.
I'm a worrywart, but I love to play video games to take my mind off things.
I love the feeling of the wind in my hair when I'm driving my truck.
I had a knee injury when I was younger, but it's healed well and doesn't bother me anymore.
I have a standing bike in my house, and I use it several times a day.

participant_2.background:
I love to go to pride parades and dance around with my friends!
i like to go to the casino on weekends.
i am currently trying to open my own grocery store.
I'm a weirdo who loves to swim in the lake.
I have a side hustle that I do not tell my parents about because they wouldn't approve.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm just hanging out at home today. What are you up to?
I'm about to head out to the lake to swim. It's such a beautiful day!
That sounds fun! I love swimming in the lake.
Me too! I wish I could do it every day.
I know what you mean. I used to go swimming all the time when I was younger.
Me too! I miss those days.
Maybe we should go swimming together sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to.
Great! We can make a date.
Sounds good! I'll bring the swimsuit.
